TopicTitle: It’s a miracle! It’s a miracle! My landing gears is healed!

Articles.Content:
I had a lander that it come down, hard , Several of its landing struts were “broken.”  I don’t have an engineer that can fix them.  Now suddenly (after the 1.1, and 1.1.1 upgrades) They's Healed!!

It’s a Miracle!

Is there an Anti Kraken?

One time, I was blessed by the anti-Kraken. I was loading up KSP (I believe I was just starting to learn about mods, and was testing some combination of EVE folders). Instead of displaying the loading bar screen, it went straight to the black screen with the loading icon in the corner, then to the main menu. I was stunned. It only happened that one time, though, long ago...
